Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

Reuben

 Washington Square Park

⏲ 9:00 a.m. on Wednesday, August 14

What are you doing today?

I woke up early, so I'm going to skate for a while, then go to work. And then probably meet up with some friends afterwards, kick back a little.

What's your favorite part of the day?

Probably the morning. I'm an early riser, I just wake up and I'm ready to go. I get out before a lot of my friends do. I get a lot more time skating, which is nice.

What are you doing tomorrow?

Tomorrow I have work, so similar to today. Until I get off for a few days.

Made in New York City by Dave Dawson & Bekka Palmer.
